word_mean: 希腊语第九个字母〔I，ι〕，意为微小，一点儿

sentence.Network_cn: 我们的信贷标准一点都没有变。

sentence.Network_cn: 他的故事没有一点是真的.

sentence.Network_en: He's never shown an iota of interest in any kind of work.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从来没有对任何工作表现出一点儿兴趣。

derivation.yuyuan_name: from Greek iōta. Compare with jot

encyclopedia.content: IOTA是国际掩食计时协会The International Occultation Timing Association的缩写。 掩星可分为两种，即全掩和掠掩。而可观测的掩星种类有：月掩星（分月掩恒星、月掩行星、月掩小行星）、行星掩星、行星卫星掩星和小行星掩星等。其中以月掩星最为常见，而后者则较为罕见。进行掩星观测在科学研究中具有重大意义。现代月掩星观测可以测出观测地的经纬度及帮助天文学家研究计算并修正月球轨道精确数据，通过月球质量及因地球本身不

entry.def: If you say that there is not an iota or not one iota of something, you are emphasizing that there is not even a very small amount of it.

example.ex: He's never shown an iota of interest in any kind of work.
example.tran: 他从来没有对任何工作表现出一点儿兴趣。

entry.tran: (用于强调否定)一点儿也不,一点儿也没有
entry.def: You can use an iota or one iota to emphasize a negative statement. Not an iota or not one iota means not even to a small extent or degree.

example.ex: Our credit standards haven't changed one iota.
example.tran: 我们的信贷标准一点都没有变。

means.word_mean: 1. a tiny or scarcely detectable amount
2. the 9th letter of the Greek alphabet
